item.title: Chapter III: How do we pick stocks
item.description: There are more than tons of thousand methods of stock picking but it all come down to TWO basic analyses: fundamental analysis and technical analysis. Fundamental analysis [FA] is a way trying to understand better the companies and their business models. We want to look at its business fundamentals such as the financial ratios. We also want to measure its business based on its past, current and future performance. This can be done by looking at their financial statements.
